TopicTitle: bug:Cant exit out of certain areas and go back to menu.

Articles.Content: this video describes some of it but you will see I cant go into the VAB or the space plane hanger also when I get into something like the research building I cant get out and I cant exit to menu.It happens even if I restart the game and I say I have a mod installed because I do but is incompatible with ksp .90 but I never had any issues with it for about when .90 came out so I dont think thats the problem.The mod is deadly reentry.

please anyone I cant play ksp until I get this fixed also please ask for more information if you need any

Edited April 21, 2015 by FlamingOnion_1

Hello, perhaps with the logs you will have more help

Please read this How To Get Support.

(And Deadly Reentry is compatible with KSP 0.90 ...)
I do know that deadly reentry is compatible now with .90 just im to lazy to upgrade to that version you should see the log in a second
